description: Lot 162 Suffrage sent by Gen. Rosalie Jones while enroute to Cleveland 9-3-12 election,  'We all have great hopes of winning the state! It's going to be very exciting towards the end',  to Mrs. Martin S. Watts,  N.Y.C.,  pu-Sidney,  OH. 8-18-12,  extrordinary [sic],  F
